stimulusHtml: The image could best be used to help illustrate which of the following about the transatlantic slave trade?

features.html:
• In the foreground are several African people on the shore of a large body of water showing various states of distress.
  • In the middle ground are several African people, also showing distress, in a rowboat being rowed away from the shore.
  • In the right background is a large sailing ship preparing to sail away from the shore.

Chambon, M. Marché d’esclaves, 1764, Engraving, Courtesy of Slavery Images: A Visual Record of the African Slave Trade and Slave Life in the Early African Diaspora. http://www.slaveryimages.org/s/slaveryimages/item/1983.

choicesHtml: Only a small minority of enslaved Africans were transported directly to mainland North America.
The trade lasted for over 350 years, from the early 1500s to the mid-1800s.
France was one of the top enslaving nations in the Atlantic world.
African kingdoms played an important role in supplying enslaved persons for the transatlantic trade.
